DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate safety LBH589 give combination lenalidomide dexamethasone adult patient multiple myeloma
DOC.brief_title: Safety Study LBH589 When Given Combination With Lenalidomide Dexamethasone Adult Patients With Multiple Myeloma .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Patients must diagnosis active multiple myeloma Patients must receive least one prior line therapy disease relapsed.. Patients must suitable treatment lenalidomide & dexamethasone . Adults ≥ 18 year old ECOG Performance Status ≤ 2 Life expectancy > 12 week Patients must acceptable neutrophil platelet count well adequate kidney liver function . Able sign inform consent comply protocol Exclusion criterion : Primary refractory MM Peripheral neuropathy ≥ CTCAE grade 2 Impaired cardiac function clinically significant cardiac disease Impairment GI function GI disease may significantly alter absorption LBH589 Patients diarrhea > CTCAE grade 1 Patients use medication relative risk prolong QT interval Concomitant use CYP3A4 inhibitor Patients history deep vein thrombosis thromboembolism within < 6 month prior start study treatment Patients undergone major surgery ≤ 4 week prior start study drug recover side effect therapy Women pregnant breast feed woman childbearing potential ( WOCBP ) use 2 reliable form birth control Male patient whose sexual partner WOCBP unable use latex condom sexual contact ( even undergone vasectomy ) Patients significant history noncompliance medical regimen unwilling unable comply instruction give him/her study staff . Other protocol define inclusion/exclusion criterion may apply
